analysis.description:
ICO.sendEthForReward (/unique_chucks/4/0x607fb630f2ddf7aeb1a207d7cb6ba6ec9f10c308.sol#934-945) sends eth to arbitrary user

	- msg.sender.transfer(ethAmountForReward) (/unique_chucks/4/0x607fb630f2ddf7aeb1a207d7cb6ba6ec9f10c308.sol#943-944)
